div.p: Codes for documenting the reason behind the existence of an alias.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-organizationdemographics
CodeDisplay
legalalternativelegal alternativeA pseudonym used by an organization to perform their business under a name that differs from the registered, legal name of the business, also known as a trade name, business name, or 'doing business as' (d.b.a.).
historicalHistoricalAny previously used legal or trade names used by an organization since the creation of the business. Could include names used by independent organizations before a merger or other reorganization.
